wobani.resources.spline

Class BezierSpline

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.resources.spline.SimpleSpline
      • wobani.resources.spline.CubicSpline
        • wobani.resources.spline.BezierSpline
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable, Resource, Spline

    public class BezierSpline
extends CubicSpline
    Implementation of the Bezier spline.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        @Nullable
protected org.joml.Vector3f getValue(int startIndex,
                                                float t)
        Description copied from class: SimpleSpline
        Returns the point on the spline between the startIndexth and startIndex+1th controlpoints, specified by the argument t. This method returns to null if the spline doesn't contain any points. The startIndex can't be lower than 0 and can't be higher than the control point's number -1 (except if it's a loop spline).
        Overrides:
        getValue in class SimpleSpline
        Parameters:
        startIndex - start control point's index
        t - "time"
        Returns:
        the specified point of the spline
        See Also:
        SimpleSpline.getNumberOfControlPoints()

      • normalizeHelperPoints

        public void normalizeHelperPoints(float distance)
        This method helps you if you don't want to give each control point's helper points by hand. It replaces all the helper points accoarding to the line indicated by the previous and the next control point.
        Parameters:
        distance - distance between the control point and it's helper points
